1.saying: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same

2.saying: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation

3.saying: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts

4.saying: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone

5.saying: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning

6.saying: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse
